name: New Year river cruise

activePartner.label: Arena Travel
activePartner.partnerDescription: Arena Travel has been providing high-quality special-interest tours and holidays for more than 40 years. With a passion for detail and a commitment to professionalism by using only the best-value suppliers, Telegraph readers can be sure of a personal service whether they are travelling solo or with a larger group. Arena Travel handpicks its tour managers for their friendly approach, years of experience and understated presence on each trip. They understand that you need the freedom to enjoy your holiday, but they will always be available for advice about everything from excursions and amenities to local customs and exclusive events. Arena Tours Limited trading as Arena Travel, company no. 2431120 of Explorer House, 2 Betts Avenue, Martlesham Heath, Ipswich, Suffolk, IP5 3RH.

overview: Add some sparkle to your celebrations and join us in Antwerp, the city of diamonds, for an unforgettable way to end the year. Brussels is our first port of call, where we have plenty of free time. We then cruise to Ghent, a city filled with dreamy canals and cobbled streets. Join our included excursion to the medieval masterpiece that is Bruges before ending up in Antwerp, where we enjoy the build up to the celebrations along the riverbanks as well as our own on-board party.

otherInfo.text: Prices are per person and based on two people sharing a twin cabin. Single supplements will apply.

inclusions: Executive return coach travel from a departure point near you
Return overnight ferry from Newcastle to Amsterdam, in an en suite cabin
En suite cabin accommodation aboard the MS Serenity
Entertainment every night of your cruise
Welcome drink, Captains get-together and party night
Visits to Ghent, Bruges, Antwerp and Brussels

stops.title: Day 1: UK to Rotterdam
stops.text: We travel to Rotterdam in Holland and enjoy a relaxing evening aboard our ship as we cruise towards Belgium.

stops.title: Day 2: Brussels
stops.text: Brussels is known as the capital of Europe and boasts a beautiful central square. Join our optional guided tour to see the highlights including the Atomium, a huge replica of an iron atom which has become the unmistakable symbol of Belgium.

stops.title: Day 3: Brussels
stops.text: Today you can join our optional excursion to the charming city of Mechelen where we enjoy a tour and tasting at a local brewery no visit to Belgium is complete without tasting the beer! Later in the day we begin cruising towards Ghent.

stops.title: Day 4: Ghent and Bruges
stops.text: The small city of Ghent is filled with dreamy canals, cobbled streets and beautiful buildings. We arrive here during breakfast and stay overnight, so there is plenty of time to explore. You can also join our included excursion to Bruges, a masterpiece of medieval times. Much of the architecture is perfectly preserved and the streets and squares are largely traffic-free, so its a joy to explore on foot.

stops.title: Day 5: New Year's Eve: Ghent to Antwerp
stops.text: Relax on board our ship as we spend a full day cruising between Ghent and Antwerp. We reach Antwerp in the early evening, where you can enjoy the local celebrations along with our on-board party.

stops.title: Day 6: New Year's Day: Antwerp
stops.text: Happy New Year! Relax and enjoy the atmosphere on board our ship or take some time out to stroll around Antwerp. Later today we cruise back towards Rotterdam.

stops.title: Day 7: Rotterdam to UK
stops.text: We bid farewell to our captain and crew and set off on the return journey.
